item.title: SDLC: The Deployment phase
item.description: The deployment stage involves releasing the software into production and making it available for end users. The main goals of the deployment stage are: Install and configure the software on production infrastructure. Migrate data from old systems if needed. Run integration, performance, and security tests. Release the software for use by end users. Proper deployment is critical for delivering high quality software that meets customer needs. This article provides a comprehensive overview of the deployment stage, best practices, challenges, and key steps involved.
